title: Yellen Delivers Assessment Of Economy
teaser: Federal Reserve chair Janet Yellen is testifying before Congress, as the Fed remains concerned about low inflation and weak job growth.
contentencoded:
Janet Yellen, the chair of the Federal Reserve, testifies before Congress today, as the Fed remains concerned about low inflation and weak job growth. Craig Torres is covering the hearing for Bloomberg News and join Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details.

Guest

  • Craig Torres, Federal Reserve and U.S. economy reporter for Bloomberg News. She tweets @ctorresreporter.
